newsitem.title: TURKEY: SOCCER-NIGERIAN AMOKACHI IN TRAFFIC ACCIDENT.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-NIGERIAN AMOKACHI IN TRAFFIC ACCIDENT.

text.p: Nigerian World Cup footballer Daniel Amokachi escaped unhurt when his car struck a tree in the early hours of Saturday morning, Turkish media said.
The state-run Anatolian news agency said the two front tyres of Amokachi's brand-new car suddenly burst, causing the crash.
Amokachi, who plays for Istanbul club Besiktas, scored in this year's Olympic final to help Nigeria beat Argentina 3-2 and win the title.
